statements: SELECT * FROM WeatherData
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData
SELECT rainfall, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT date, rainfall FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 20
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE rainfall > 0.5 ORDER BY date LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM WeatherData
SELECT date, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM WeatherData GROUP BY date ORDER BY avg_temp DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT humidity, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDemand WHERE grid_operation_mode = 'high_demand' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, energy_demand FROM EnergyDemand WHERE energy_demand > 100 ORDER BY energy_demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 70 ORDER BY id;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM WeatherData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_demand FROM EnergyDemand WHERE grid_operation_mode = 'normal' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_demand FROM EnergyDemand WHERE energy_demand > 1000 AND grid_operation_mode = 'emergency' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT location, date FROM EnergyDemand ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, status FROM GridOperations WHERE operation_type = 'maintenance'
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2022-08-15'
SELECT MAX(demand) AS max_demand FROM EnergyDemand
SELECT id, location, date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, location, date, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE location = 'New York' AND date >= '2021-01-01' AND date <= '2021-03-31'
SELECT location, date, demand, forecast FROM EnergyDemand WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY demand DESC
SELECT * FROM GridOperations WHERE status = 'Completed' AND operation_type = 'Maintenance'
SELECT id, location, date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 80 AND temperature < 30 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT date, demand FROM energy_demand WHERE region_id = 2 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT operation_type FROM grid_operations WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-10';
SELECT city_id, precipitation FROM weather_forecast WHERE date = '2022-09-20';
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY city_id DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT city_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY city_id HAVING avg_temp > 25
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50
SELECT city_id, date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE city_id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT w.city_id, w.date, w.temperature, wf.forecasted_demand FROM weather_data w JOIN weather_forecast wf ON w.city_id = wf.city_id AND w.date = wf.date WHERE w.date = '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM weather_data
SELECT location_id, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 50
SELECT asset_name, asset_location FROM grid_assets
SELECT demand, timestamp FROM energy_demand ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM grid_operations WHERE operation_type = 'Maintenance'
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY humidity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_id, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 AND temperature > 20;
SELECT operation_name, operation_start_time, operation_end_time FROM grid_operations WHERE operation_type = 'Maintenance' ORDER BY operation_start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM grid_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Solar Panel' AND asset_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT adjustment_type, adjustment_timestamp, adjustment_details FROM grid_adjustments WHERE adjustment_type = 'Voltage Adjustment' ORDER BY adjustment_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
